name: FrizzForecast
0:
”Alexa, ask Frizz Forecast Will I have a good hair day”
”Alexa, ask Frizz Forecast What is the frizz forecast”
”Alexa, open Frizz Forecast.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: frizz forecast
des:
The struggle is real. Especially when it comes to unpredictable hair due to Mother Nature.

Do you check the weather every morning to decide how to style your hair for the day? Have you spent extra time on your hair in the morning, just to have it ruined when you step outside?

Well, say no more. Ask Alexa for your Frizz Forecast every morning, and she will tell you if you’re going to have a good hair day or if you should consider a ponytail. Oh, and you’ll hear the regular weather forecast too.

Enjoy!
